      • readXml

        public <T> T readXml(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                     java.lang.String... filepath)
              throws PlayerDataException
        Description copied from interface: PlayerData
        Converts XML from a file into an object. Note the object must use the mini2Dx data annotations.
        Specified by:
        readXml in interface PlayerData
        Parameters:
        clazz - The object type to convert the XML into
        filepath - The path to the XML file. This will be resolved as a path within the game data location.
        Returns:
        The resulting object
        Throws:
        PlayerDataException - Thrown if the XML is invalid, the file does not exist or the game data location cannot be accessed.
